snippet: A federal appeals court on Thursday refused to reconsider its previous ruling that upheld restrictions that have closed most abortion facilities in Texas.
abstract: Federal appeals court refuses to reconsider its previous ruling that upheld restrictions that have closed most abortion facilities in Texas.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Thursday refused to reconsider its previous ruling that upheld restrictions that have closed most abortion facilities in Texas.

headline.main: Texas: Court Refuses Request to Reconsider Abortion Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Texas: Court Refuses Request to Reconsider Abortion Restrictions
